text: The 1919 Drexel Dragons football team represented Drexel Institute—now known as Drexel University—in the 1919 college football season. Led by W. L. Ridpath in this first and only season as head coach, the team compiled a record of 0–4. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Drexel Football
title: 1919 Drexel Dragons football team
